蒣蒣蒣

蒣字的基本解释

蒣
xú
古书上说的一种草。

蒣
shú
古同“稌”，薯蓣。一种草本植物，根圆柱形，含淀粉和蛋白质，可食。亦称“山药”。

蒣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xú］
［《集韻》詳余切，平魚，邪。］
草名。
[②]［shú］
［《集韻》常如切，平魚，襌。］
同“徐1”。
山芋，山药。

蒣字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蒣； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1049第01
【集韻】祥余切，音徐。【篇海】草名。【直音】同藷。

蒣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
蒣字的起名意思

古书上说的一种草。

蒣
Basic explanation of words
蒣
xú
A kind of grass said in ancient books.
蒣
shú
The ancient same "稌", yam. A herbaceous plant with cylindrical roots, containing starch and protein, and edible. Also known as "yam".
蒣
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xú］
["Jiyun" is detailed in detail, flat fish, evil. ]
Cursive name.
[②]［shú］
["Jiyun" is often like cut, flat fish, sneezes. ]
Same as "Xu 1".
Yam, yam.
蒣
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蒣; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 1049 01
[Jiyun] Xiangyuqie, sound Xu. 【Article Sea】The name of the grass. [Straight tone] Same potato.
蒣
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Korean Ming Dynasty
蒣
Name meaning
A kind of grass said in ancient books.
xú, shú
